meanings.definition: A person or thing that descends.
meanings.sent1: The brave descenders climbed down the mountain safely.
meanings.sent2: The skydiver was a skilled descender, landing perfectly every time.
meanings.sent3: The elevator was full of descenders trying to reach the ground floor.
meanings.sent4: In the race, the descender swiftly moved downhill like a speeding bullet.
meanings.sent5: The descender in the play gracefully descended the staircase, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: The parts of lowercase letters that extend below the baseline in typography.
meanings.sent1: The letter 'g' and 'y' have descenders that go below the line.
meanings.sent2: When writing in cursive, it's important to pay attention to descenders.
meanings.sent3: The descenders in the font made the text look elegant and stylish.
meanings.sent4: The descenders on the calligraphy added a touch of sophistication to the piece.
meanings.sent5: The descenders on the handwritten note gave it a unique and artistic flair.
